argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_tfr1 | |- F Fn On |
| 3 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( F Fn On -> dom F = On ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom F = On |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( A e. dom F <-> A e. On ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_tfr2a | |- ( A e. dom F -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylbir | |- ( A e. On -> ( F ` A ) = ( G ` ( F |` A ) ) ) |
